text.content:
Per Injenia - societ√† parte del Gruppo con sede a Bologna - siamo alla ricerca di programmatori software in ambito mobile per lo sviluppo e l'evoluzione di applicazioni mobile a livello di prodotti e progetti software basati principalmente su tecnologia Flutter.
Cerchiamo persone motivate, con la passione per le tecnologie e con la voglia di mettere un pizzico di valore aggiunto in quello che fanno.
Seguirai le fasi di sviluppo software, stesura del codice e documentazione del codice di progetto, sulla base delle direttive del responsabile di team e di progetto. Potrai partecipare alle fasi di analisi dei requisiti tecnici e di design delle soluzioni.

text.content: Siamo una Family Company da oltre cento anni. Conoscenza e tecnologia sono le nostre passioni, e il nostro business. Noi le trasformiamo in prodotti, servizi e soluzioni integrate per promuovere e sostenere la trasformazione digitale, l‚Äôinnovazione di processo e la semplificazione della Pubblica Amministrazione, delle Imprese e del mondo delle Libere Professioni. Grazie alla passione e alla competenza di oltre 2000 collaboratori abbiamo conquistato la leadership di mercato in Italia e siamo in forte crescita nel mercato internazionale.

text.content:
Satispay is an Italian Scale-up operating in the mobile payment industry. Having created a payment system independent from debit and credit cards, Satispay allows users to pay stores or friends from their smartphone. Our offices are in Milan, Luxembourg City and Berlin.
More than just an App, Satispay is a Company, a group of creative, curious, enthusiastic people determined to make an impact in everyday life!

After becoming a unicorn, we are not done yet: due to our recent growth, we have partnered with ONYON, an application that allows people to order and pay from the table directly with their smartphones and in total autonomy.
Do you want to be part of this new project?

rich_text.plain_text:
Satispay is an Italian Scale-up operating in the mobile payment industry. Having created a payment system independent from debit and credit cards, Satispay allows users to pay stores or friends from their smartphone. Our offices are in Milan, Luxembourg City and Berlin.
More than just an App, Satispay is a Company, a group of creative, curious, enthusiastic people determined to make an impact in everyday life!

After becoming a unicorn, we are not done yet: due to our recent growth, we have partnered with ONYON, an application that allows people to order and pay from the table directly with their smartphones and in total autonomy.
Do you want to be part of this new project?

text.content:
As a Flutter Software Engineer, you will work in a cross-functional ONYON‚Äôs team and will be specifically responsible for both web and mobile app development: from ideation and analysis of new features, to their development, testing, publishing and monitoring.

You‚Äôll be responsible for:
‚Ä¢ Fully understand the product and business
‚Ä¢ Identify points of improvement for the product
‚Ä¢ Refine ideas for new features with customers and stakeholders
‚Ä¢ Identify product enhancements that will help ONYON to achieve its goals in the marketplace
‚Ä¢ Implement new features on the web and mobile apps, writing clean, self-tested code (unit, integration, end-to-end)
‚Ä¢ Bring new app versions into production, monitoring the actual operation and results

rich_text.plain_text:
As a Flutter Software Engineer, you will work in a cross-functional ONYON‚Äôs team and will be specifically responsible for both web and mobile app development: from ideation and analysis of new features, to their development, testing, publishing and monitoring.

You‚Äôll be responsible for:
‚Ä¢ Fully understand the product and business
‚Ä¢ Identify points of improvement for the product
‚Ä¢ Refine ideas for new features with customers and stakeholders
‚Ä¢ Identify product enhancements that will help ONYON to achieve its goals in the marketplace
‚Ä¢ Implement new features on the web and mobile apps, writing clean, self-tested code (unit, integration, end-to-end)
‚Ä¢ Bring new app versions into production, monitoring the actual operation and results

text.content:
We are looking for brilliant talents willing to share our enthusiasm and passion for new projects. The stack ranges differs depending on the projects you are working on. On the Frontend side Flutter (web & mobile) & Angular, while for the Backend Node.js, MongoDB & RabbitMQ; Kubernetes on Microsoft Azure as infrastructure.

The ideal candidate will have:
‚Ä¢ Passion for the startup world, technology and innovative product development
‚Ä¢ Willingness to work in a team, collaborating with both other tech and business stakeholders
‚Ä¢ Experience in mobile and web application development (not necessarily with Flutter)
‚Ä¢ Experience in REST and GraphQL API integration
‚Ä¢ Ability to write automated tests at different levels (unit, integration, end-to-end)

Nice to have:
‚Ä¢ Experience in cross-functional teams with agile methodologies
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of Domain Driven Design or have applied it in the past
‚Ä¢ Experience with eXtreme Programming development practices (TDD, Pair Programming, Refactoring, CI) and clean code
‚Ä¢ Interest in working on the backend as well

text.content:
The role is based in Milan, Italy. We apply a hybrid working policy.

Based on experience, the first gross annual salary will be up to ‚Ç¨ 30,000.00 per year for junior profiles and up to ‚Ç¨ 60,000.00 per year for senior profiles.
